summary: a spell that teleports you to a home for the player to use at their will.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION:
this is a variation of the mod \"soul forge\" by  DefiniteIntegral  if you dont like my mod you can view his original version right here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8971&navtag=file/images.php?id=8971&tab=3
 
i loved his mod a lot, but i thought it could use a few more homier touches.  and sense i have a fascination with the dwemer i added lots of their architecture to it.

FEATURES:
-soul forge for soul storage(if you want to know more visit DefiniteIntegral\'s mod)
-6 weapon racks
-10 mannequins
-sleeping area with khajiit female for company
-garden with various assortments of plants.
-teleport spell that you can use from anywhere to get to and from the soul forge
-various dwemer decorations along with giant mushrooms

HOW TO USE: 
-download mod
-install it into data folder
- find spell tome in dragonsreach in farengar\'s \"office\" thing
-read spell tome, them use the teleport spell to get to your newly acquired house

ISSUES: 
-followers cannot follow you inside :(
- i have been told that  there are problems with the soul store, i do not use it so i have not found any. if you find some let me know and i will try to fix it.
-other than that it should work fibne, it should be compatible with any other mod because it is in its own worldspace. unless you put on a mod that puts something else exactly where the spell tome is placed.
 
please rate and give me any feedback on how to improve, this is my first mod and i am still learning.

NOTE: i will be updating this every once and a while with more content added on, im thinking of adding a whole other area for people to explore, kill enemies and collect treasure among the ancient ruins of the dwemer.
author: jubjub123 and DefiniteIntegral
